tool_description: An API for a huge amount of articles for  the newest software techologies,  development and much more...
name: Pluralsight Articles
title: Pluralsight Articles

api_list.name: Get data with articles about software development
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back data with around 100 articles from Pluralsight's "software-development" section.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pluralsight-articles.p.rapidapi.com/articles/software-development"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pluralsight-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pluralsight-articles.p.rapidapi.com/articles/{pathid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pluralsight-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
